summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses scheduling a meeting for January 16, 2013, at Epstein's residence.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and Paul Morris.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank and is being asked to meet with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual with whom Lesley Groff and Paul Morris are trying to schedule a meeting.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Paul Morris are communicating about a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is being asked to meet with Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.
Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a working relationship.

events.title: Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting is scheduled to take place at Jeffrey Epstein's residence.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Paul Morris to see Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting is scheduled for January 16, 2013, at Epstein's residence.
Paul Morris is identified as a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank Private Wealth Management.
